title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 15.9 - Refunds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 15.9 - Refunds

State Regulations

Whenver it is determined that a person is entitled to a
refund of a use tax which has been collected by DMV, it shall be the
responsibility of DMV to make such refund. A tax refund shall only be issued by
DMV when a registration refund is authorized by section
428
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
15.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
